mapper.select: SELECT alarm_idx, title, alarm_date, alarm_time, is_read FROM alarm WHERE users_idx = #{usersIdx} ORDER BY alarm_date DESC, alarm_time DESC, alarm_idx DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarm (alarm_type, title, alarm_date, alarm_time, content, link, is_routing, is_read, users_idx,house_type) VALUES (#{alarmType}, #{title}, #{alarmDate}, #{alarmTime}, #{content}, #{link}, #{isRouting}, #{isRead}, #{usersIdx},#{houseType})
mapper.update: UPDATE alarm SET is_read = TRUE WHERE users_idx = #{usersIdx} AND is_read = FALSE
